00081 sbwSignatureArray::sbwSignatureArray(SignatureType st, Integer d) : scalarType(st), dimensions(d)
00082 {
00083 }
00084 
00092 void sbwSignatureArray::write(DataBlockWriter writer, va_list &ap)
00093 {
00094         sbwSignatureType *innerType = scalarType.getImpl();
00095 
00096         switch (dimensions)
00097         {
00098                 case 1 :
00099                         {
00100                                 Integer size = va_arg(ap, Integer);
00101                                 innerType->write1DArray(writer, size, ap);
00102                                 break ;
00103                         }
00104                 case 2 :
00105                         {
00106                                 Integer xSize = va_arg(ap, Integer);
00107                                 Integer ySize = va_arg(ap, Integer);
00108                                 innerType->write2DArray(writer, xSize, ySize, ap);
00109                                 break ;
00110                         }
00111                 default :
00112                         throw new SBWUnsupportedObjectTypeException("1 and 2 dimension arrays supported only");
00113         }
00114 }
00115 
00126 void sbwSignatureArray::read(DataBlockReader reader, va_list &ap)
00127 {
00128         sbwSignatureType *innerType = scalarType.getImpl();
00129 
00130         switch (dimensions)
00131         {
00132                 case 1 :
00133                         {
00134                                 Integer *size = va_arg(ap, Integer *);
00135                                 innerType->read1DArray(reader, *size, ap);
00136                                 break ;
00137                         }
00138                 case 2 :
00139                         {
00140                                 Integer *xSize = va_arg(ap, Integer *);
00141                                 Integer *ySize = va_arg(ap, Integer *);
00142                                 innerType->read2DArray(reader, *xSize, *ySize, ap);
00143                                 break ;
00144                         }
00145                 default :
00146                         throw new SBWUnsupportedObjectTypeException("1 and 2 dimension arrays supported only");
00147         }
00148 }
00149 
00154 void sbwSignatureArray::write1DArray(DataBlockWriter writer, Integer size, va_list &ap)
00155 {
00156         throw SBWUnsupportedObjectTypeException("arrays of arrays not supported");
00157 }
00158 
00163 void sbwSignatureArray::read1DArray(DataBlockReader reader, Integer &size, va_list &ap)
00164 {
00165         throw SBWUnsupportedObjectTypeException("arrays of arrays not supported");
00166 }
00167 
00172 void sbwSignatureArray::write2DArray(DataBlockWriter writer, Integer xsize, Integer ysize, va_list &ap)
00173 {
00174         throw SBWUnsupportedObjectTypeException("arrays of arrays not supported");
00175 }
00176 
00181 void sbwSignatureArray::read2DArray(DataBlockReader reader, Integer &xsize, Integer &ysize, va_list &ap)
00182 {
00183         throw SBWUnsupportedObjectTypeException("arrays of arrays not supported");
00184 }

00190 bool sbwSignatureArray::match(sbwSignatureType *other)
00191 {
00192         return getType() == other->getType() && getArrayInnerType()->match(other->getArrayInnerType());
00193 }
